name: VibrantSnap
tagline: Create & Share Videos That Convert
description: Record your screen, highlight key moments, and instantly share a demo that turns viewers into customers.

name: Tweny
tagline: Focus timer that actually cares about your eyes
description: If you spend 7+ hours a day staring at screens, your eyes are paying the price. Eye floaters. Headaches. Blurry vision. I built Tweny because I was tired of my own eye strain. Tweny is the first focus timer that combines the 20-20-20 rule with Pomodoro. Every work interval ends with a proper eye break. You stay productive AND protect your vision. Key features - Live Activities - Apple Watch app - Health tips from proffesionals - Badges, streaks and 12 levels to complete

name: HMPL
tagline: Lightweight server-oriented template language for JavaScript
description: HMPL.js provides the flexibility to build server-driven templates with minimal JavaScript. With its block-based syntax, customizable fetch requests, and built-in support for forms, events, and time-based syncing you can deliver dynamic user interfaces without relying on a heavy framework. HMPL integrates with JSON5 for expressive object syntax and DOMPurify for safe HTML rendering, all in just a few kilobytes.

name: Kardy
tagline: The most funnest group card eva (typos included)
description: Kardy makes it easy to send group cards online üíå Create a digital card, invite friends, family, or colleagues to sign it, and deliver it instantly ‚Äî no chasing messages or messy screenshots. Perfect for birthdays üéÇ, farewells üëã, thank-yous üôè, and team celebrations üéâ. One beautiful card, signed by everyone ‚Äî from anywhere üåç.

name: Linkeddit
tagline: Find Your Next Customers on Reddit Who Are Ready To Buy Now
description: Create custom AI agents that scrape Reddit to find users who are actively looking to buy products like yours in minutes with just a description.

name: Optivault
tagline: AI financial advisor that optimizes your money and budget.
description: OptiVault is your AI-powered personal financial advisor. Take control of your money without spreadsheets or stress. ‚úÖ Connect bank accounts securely ü§ñ Get AI insights on spending, budget, and debt üìä Track net worth and set smart goals üì± Built for iOS with bank-grade security OptiVault gives you clear, personalized steps to save more, spend smarter, and grow your wealth ‚Äî all in one simple app.

name: Meetings Wrapped
tagline: Meetings that could have been emails analyzed & visualized.
description: Meetings that could have been emails... analyzed and visualized.

name: StandBy Mode Pro
tagline: Turn your Android into a Smart Display while charging
description: StandBy Mode Pro is a take on iOS StandBy Mode built for Android. We were initially inspired by the iOS's feature but moved into a different direction bring tons of features for tablets, Photos, Productivity, Relaxing moments. Any Widget of an Installed app on the device can be used.

name: Monee
tagline: A beautifully simple way to manage your money
description: After using countless budgeting apps filled with bugs, sync issues, and confusing interfaces, I built the app I always wanted: fast, stable, and effortless. No bank connections and no broken imports. Just quick, clean input that keeps you in control. Add a transaction on one device and it appears instantly on all others. Bug-free and predictable. The most common feedback I hear is: "It just works." If you want a budgeting app that is simple and stable, I hope Monee makes your life easier.

name: Really Free QR Code Generator
description: 100% free QR code generator. No registration, no subscription, no proxy links. Generate customizable static QR codes instantly in your browser. Includes a built-in QR code scanner (image or camera). We don't store your data, no analytics, no tracking. They don't expire. What you generate is yours, forever!

name: Photo Studio AI
tagline: Run your prompt through every top AI model at once
description: Generate professional headshots, dating photos, product shots, and more in under 30 seconds. Run your prompt through Flux Pro, GPT-4o, Google Imagine, and 5 other top AI models at once, then pick the best result. 15 free credits to start. No design skills needed.

name: Kalpal
tagline: Make Your Meals 1% Better | Weight-loss App for Lazy People
description: Kalpal helps you make healthier food decisions‚Äîtiny 1% improvements that add up. Track meals, get nudges, and reach your weight-loss goals.

name: Crypto Coffee
tagline: Buy someone a coffee using crypto
description: Create your crypto tipping page. Accept tips in ETH, SOL, BTC and more. No fees, just direct wallet transfers. Simple UX to create your tipping page. Share with your community and on your socials

name: Capitall
tagline: AI Fundraising Copilot that helps founders raise 100x faster
description: Raising your first round is painfully inefficient. Especially if you don‚Äôt come from top colleges or insider networks. Most founders waste months doing cold outreach, targeting the wrong VCs. Response rates are low, rejection is high. Capitall is an AI Fundraising Copilot built to fix this. 1. We matches you with VCs who‚Äôve invested in startups like yours 2. Identifies founders similar to you who already know those VCs 3. Helps you get warm introductions instead of cold emails

name: DeadLinkRadar
tagline: Find broken links before your users do
description: DeadLinkRadar monitors any URL 24/7 and alerts you when links break. Unlike basic uptime monitors, we have deep integrations for 30+ platforms‚ÄîYouTube, file hosts, cloud storage‚Äîcatching "soft" failures that return 200 OK but are actually dead. ‚úì Monitor any URL ‚úì 15-minute checks ‚úì Email, Discord, Slack, Telegram alerts ‚úì REST API ‚úì Free tier Built for creators and developers tired of finding out about broken links from angry users.

name: Astra Launch
tagline: Ship your SaaS this weekend with auth, payments, and UI
description: The no-fluff Next.js starter kit. Auth, payments, and marketing pages pre-configured. Stop configuring, start shipping.

name: QRFlow
tagline: Free QR Code Generator and tracking
description: QRFlow: Create stunning custom QR codes with advanced analytics. Track scans by country, device, and time. Add logos, customize colors, and manage unlimited QR codes. Perfect for marketing, business, and events.

name: SnapPage Pro
tagline: Capture full-page screenshots and edit like a pro
description: SnapPage Pro is a powerful Chrome extension that lets you capture full-page screenshots, annotate, blur sensitive data, add frames, and export in multiple formats ‚Äî all locally with a privacy-first approach. üéÅ New Year Special: Use coupon SNAPPAGENEWYEAR to get the Yearly Plan 100% FREE (valid for 30 days).

name: Remove TikTok Reposts - Unrepostify
tagline: Remove all your TikTok reposts in a tap
description: Unrepostify makes it easy to remove your TikTok reposts. Just login, fetch your reposts then remove them in a single tap. Unlike other products, Unrepostify is an app that works reliably and with speed.

name: MarketAlerts.ai
tagline: Watch your portfolio, analyze stocks, find trades with AI
description: Introducing the Apache upgrade - the equivalent of an AI analyst team moving through the markets and delivering alpha for you. Use AI to watch your portfolio, analyze any stock instantly, find trade ideas that suit your style, and uncover rare market-moving patterns. Try it out, it's free.
